summary: Utility module for the grapheme-to-phoneme component of a text‑to‑speech system. It provides helpers to retrieve heteronym span information, map word identifiers to phoneme sequences, read word identifier data, strip punctuation from strings, and configure grapheme case handling (lower, mixed, upper). These functions support preprocessing and data lookup needed for accurate phoneme generation.
business_intent: Enable reliable conversion of written text into phonetic representations for speech synthesis by handling case sensitivity, punctuation, and heteronym disambiguation within the TTS pipeline.
